description: Factitial Dermatitis is a skin condition characterized by self-inflicted skin lesions that are often caused by psychological factors rather than physical reasons.
possible causes: Psychological factors such as stress, anxiety, or depression
Past history of trauma or abuse
symptoms: Skin lesions that appear in unusual patterns
Feelings of itching or burning on the skin
treatments: Psychotherapy or counseling to address underlying psychological issues
Behavioral therapy to help manage skin picking behaviors
Topical treatments to help heal skin lesions
